messages.content: when is the last date to submit my assignment?

You have a Capstone Week course that's due soon, and it's a high priority task for this week. I'd recommend checking the course details for the exact deadline. However, based on the information I have, it seems like it's due before the end of this week, probably by tomorrow or the next day. I can help you review your task list and check the course details together if you'd like.

to me
UiPath - Hyderabad	View in browser


New Event Published: Hyderabad - UiPath Autonomous Agents | Building and Orchestrating Agents End-to-End [Tue, Dec 16, 4:00 PM (IST)]



Check out our next upcoming event: UiPath Autonomous Agents | Building and Orchestrating Agents End-to-End


About this event



In this session, I will walk the participants through a complete, practical implementation of a UiPath Agent, starting from understanding the use case to fully orchestrating it across UiPath services. The session will be divided into two major phases:

Agenda:

Phase 1: Understanding the Use Case & Why UiPath Agent
• Defining Problem Statement: What business challenge we are addressing and what outcome we aim to achieve.
• Why UiPath Agent?: Explanation of why this scenario is a strong fit for an agentic automation approach instead of a traditional RPA workflow.
• Complexity Breakdown
• Document/process complexity
• Decision-making needs
• Why an agent-driven, iterative approach is more suitable
• Expected behaviour and constraints
This phase sets the context for when and why organisations should prefer UiPath Agents.

Phase 2: Hands-On Build – End-to-End Agentic Automation
Participants will follow along as we construct the full solution:

Building the Base RPA Workflow

• Creating the underlying sequence/process
• Implementing reusable components
• Preparing the workflow for agent integration

Creating the UiPath Agent

• Defining the agent
• Connecting the workflow to the agent
• Configuring prompts, capabilities, and agentic logic
• Testing the agent behaviour

Building the UiPath App

• Designing an app interface for users to interact with the agent
• Linking the app to the agent for real-time responses
• Passing inputs/outputs and handling human-agent communication

Orchestrating the Entire Flow

• Using UiPath Orchestrator to bind workflows, apps, and the UiPath Agent
• Setting up triggers and execution flows
• Demonstration of the full agentic workflow in action
• Monitoring and managing the automation

Q&A + Open discussion, clarifications.

Prerequisites

Get ready with your laptop

UiPath Automation Cloud account

Sign in to cloud.uipath.com

Enable preview features in your organisation settings

Good to Have (not mandatory)

Understanding of Agent fundamentals

See you super soon



See you there!
RSVP


	
Date & time

Tue, Dec 16, 4:00 PM (GMT+5:30)
